transArray.content: I stayed for three days in a row. When I checked in on the first day, there was a bathrobe. When I cleaned it up on the second day, the bathrobe was taken away. No new ones were prepared for me. After checking out, they called to ask if they took their bathrobe. It's kind of funny. I understand clearly that there is not even a word of apology. Unsatisfactory experience.
